item.title: By: Joseph Scott

item.description: No joke, maybe the Census should have given the contract to UPS instead :-)

item.title: By: Terry (Dad)
item.dc:creator: Terry (Dad)
item.description: You would think if FedEx/UPS can use these handhelds to track packages, it wouldn't be too hard for the Census folks to do the same.
item.content:encoded: You would think if FedEx/UPS can use these handhelds to track packages, it wouldn’t be too hard for the Census folks to do the same.
